characterDescription:
Ashir is a chemist/cook and ardent, who lives with his wife, Geranid, " ... on a tiny Reshi island, technically sent to provide for the religious needs of any Vorin visitors." However, for Ashir, living there was a way of getting away and focusing on both his and his wife's experiments.
His Calling is " ... chemistry - through cooking ... as it always allowed him to eat the results."
